import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Card } from 'src/app/model/card.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-view', templateUrl: './side-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-view.component.scss'] }) export class SideViewComponent { @Input() card: Card | null = null; }
